events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and submitting your resume.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you shortly for the next steps in the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully. You demonstrated strong fundamentals in software development and problem-solving.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to participate in the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team members.
You successfully completed the technical interview with excellent coding skills and a clear understanding of system design principles.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations.
Your HR interview went well. We appreciated your questions about the team and your alignment with our values and mission.
We are pleased to propose you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback and enthusiasm after reviewing the offer. We are excited about the possibility of you joining our team.
You have officially accepted our offer. We are thrilled to welcome you aboard and will begin onboarding preparations immediately.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive further instructions about orientation, access to systems, and your first day.
The hiring process for your role is now closed successfully. Welcome again to the company, and we look forward to your contributions.
